author: cutting
msg: AVRO-963. Java: Permit compiler template directory to be overridden by Maven plugins.  Contributed by George Fletcher.

author: chirino
msg: Fixes APLO-99, APLO-100, and APLO-101 Adding more options to `SUBSCRIBE` so you can implement Kafka style durable pub/sub over a queue.
Support a `browser-end:false` option on a `SUBSCRIBE` frame to allow a Queue browser to wait for new messages instead of closing the subscription.
Support a `include-seq` and `from-seq` option on the `SUBSCRIBE` frame to finely control from where in a queue a subscription starts from.

author: chirino
msg: Stack trace associated with internal server errors were not getting logged.

author: chirino
msg: Ops, my last commit was not checking against the right local variable.
